metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11823 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Dolibarr 10.0.6, if USER_LOGIN_FAILED is active, there is a stored XSS vulnerability on the admin tools --> audit page. This may lead to stealing of the admin account.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
